column1: Sorontil is a mountain of Númenor (actually the only known besides Meneltarma) standing near the islands North Cape of Forostar
column2: with its eastern flanks forming sheer sea-cliffs.

column1: Tar-Meneldur built a tall tower in the vicinity of this mountain.
Sorontil is not given a translation in the sources
column2: but an apparent analysis would be soron + -til
column3: thus meaning "Eagle peak". The translation would suggest that its craggy peaks were possibly populated by Eagles.
